reviewText: Hot chicks. But the background narrator is annoying.

Features eight teachers disrobing in front of a chalk board, in voice overs they answer questions. One is a bad dancer. They each get a second scene, mostly shaved, close-ups! The winner gets an additional scene. Well chosen winner. Very good.
Very sensual. The women were beautiful and posed erotically.

Those of you who have grown up with Hot Body videos know exactly what to expect. Beautiful women in a softcore adult dvd. Full frontal and even closeups. The sad thing is that Hot Body is no longer producing new dvd's or VHS tapes and the prices are actually starting to rise. Check out ebay for some ridiculous bidding on Hot Body VHS tapes. When you find dvd's for less than $17 snatch them up. There aren't many out there and Totally Nude Teachers Contest is definitely one to grab.
